document.title: CD-ROM, Online, and Databases on OPACs in Research Libraries: Competition or Coexistence?
document.publication-title: School of Information Sciences -- Faculty Publications and Other Works

field.name: comments
field.value: Survey of research libraries to determine how many libraries offer what forms of databases access and how multiple options coexist within a single library.

field.name: custom_citation
field.value: Carol Tenopir and Ralf Neufang. “CD-ROM, Online, and Databases on OPACs in Research Libraries: Competition or Coexistence?” In Proceedings of the Online/CD-ROM’91 Meeting, November 1991, San Francisco. Weston, CT: Online Inc., 1991. Pp. 85-89.
